item.title: Using nix-shell as package manager for any language
item.description: Enter NIX It’s difficult to categorize Nix. On the website, it is presented as a “purely functional package manager”. However, it could also be thought of as a programming language, a configuration tool, and a build tool. In a nutshell, Nix expressions are programs written in a purely functional programming language and can return a single derivation or a set of derivations. This difficulty to categorize comes due to a few different projects sharing similar names.
